# Calendar.Component

**Enumeration**

An enumeration for the various components of a calendar date.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Component
```

## Overview

You use one or more [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Calendar/Component] values with the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Calendar/component(_:from:)] or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Calendar/dateComponents(_:from:)] methods to specify parts to extract from a given [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date].

The following code listing shows how to use the year, month, and day components to get the corresponding units of the current Gregorian calendar date as a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/DateComponents] instance.

```swift
let myCalendar = Calendar(identifier: .gregorian)
let ymd = myCalendar.dateComponents([.year, .month, .day], from: Date())
```

## Specifying Years and Months

- **Calendar.Component.era**: Identifier for the era unit.
- **Calendar.Component.year**: Identifier for the year unit.
- **Calendar.Component.yearForWeekOfYear**: Identifier for the week-counting year unit.
- **Calendar.Component.quarter**: Identifier for the quarter of the calendar.
- **Calendar.Component.month**: Identifier for the month unit.

## Specifying Weeks and Days

- **Calendar.Component.weekOfYear**: Identifier for the week of the year unit.
- **Calendar.Component.weekOfMonth**: Identifier for the week of the month calendar unit.
- **Calendar.Component.weekday**: Identifier for the weekday unit.
- **Calendar.Component.weekdayOrdinal**: Identifier for the weekday ordinal unit.
- **Calendar.Component.day**: Identifier for the day unit.

## Specifying Hours, Minutes, and Seconds

- **Calendar.Component.hour**: Identifier for the hour unit.
- **Calendar.Component.minute**: Identifier for the minute unit.
- **Calendar.Component.second**: Identifier for the second unit.
- **Calendar.Component.nanosecond**: Identifier for the nanosecond unit.

## Specifying Calendars and Time Zones

- **Calendar.Component.calendar**: Identifier for the calendar unit.
- **Calendar.Component.timeZone**: Identifier for the time zone unit.

## Enumeration Cases

- **Calendar.Component.dayOfYear**
- **Calendar.Component.isLeapMonth**
- **Calendar.Component.isRepeatedDay**

## Extracting Components

- **date(_:matchesComponents:)**: Determines if the date has all of the specified date components.
- **component(_:from:)**: Returns the value for one component of a date.
- **dateComponents(_:from:)**: Returns all the date components of a date, using the calendar time zone.
- **dateComponents(_:from:to:)**: Returns the difference between two dates.
- **dateComponents(_:from:to:)**: Returns the difference between two dates specified as `DateComponents`.
- **dateComponents(in:from:)**: Returns all the date components of a date, as if in a given time zone (instead of the `Calendar` time zone).

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
